src:
Respek, Gerard Pique Jelaskan Hubungannya dengan Pemain Real Madrid
01 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gerard Pique sedikit membongkar hubungan pribadinya dengan pemain-pemain Real Madrid. Sebagai bek Barcelona, tentu mereka terikat rivalitas sengit di atas lapangan.
Duel Barcelona vs Real Madrid selalu menjadi satu sajian terpanas sepak bola Spanyol. Bertajuk El Clasico, pertandingan itu bukan hanya soal tiga poin, lebih dari itu adalah tentang gengsi dan harga diri.
El Clasico selalu sengit, panas, keras, bahkan berdarah-darah. Intinya, pertandingan ini adalah salah satu pertandingan istimewa yang wajib ditonton penikmat sepak bola di seluruh dunia.
Kendati demikian, meski begitu sengit di lapangan, Pique mengaku hubungan pribadi mereka di luar lapangan berjalan sangat baik. Seperti apa? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Respect, Gerard Pique Explain His Relationship with Real Madrid Players
Nov 1, 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gerard Pique has slightly exposed his personal relationships with Real Madrid players. As Barcelona defenders, of course they are bound by fierce rivalry on the field.
The Barcelona vs Real Madrid duel has always been the hottest dish of Spanish football. El Clasico titled, the match was not just a matter of three points, more than that it was about prestige and pride.
El Clasico is always fierce, hot, hard, even bleeding. In essence, this match is one of the special matches that must be watched by soccer connoisseurs around the world.
Nevertheless, despite being so fierce on the field, Pique claimed their personal relations outside the field went very well. Like what? Read below, Bolaneters!
